english.segment1: Today is not a good day. Stranded in the heartache. Watching all the world race. and pass me by
english.segment2: Like a wave on the ocean. Comes a flood of emotion. And it cant go unspoken. No it cant go unspoken one more time
english.segment3: We fall apart just to come alive. A broken heart can shatter all the lies. A brand new start and a goodbye. We fall apart just to come alive
english.segment4: Yeah but this is still a good life. Standing in the sunlight. Scattering a long line. Of fear and shame. Cause underneaththe surface there's a heart and a purpose. And I swear that its just worth it. Yeah I swear that its worth it
